cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.IT, cs.GT. 

The paper proposes a new algorithm for adversarial multi-armed bandits, which is a problem in machine learning and optimization. The algorithm is based on the Follow the Regularized Leader (FTRL) framework, which is a popular approach in online learning and optimization. Therefore, the paper is likely to belong to the Machine Learning (cs.LG), Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI), and Data Structures and Algorithms (cs.DS) sub-categories. Additionally, the paper involves information theory and game theory, which are relevant to the Information Theory (cs.IT) and Game Theory (cs.GT) sub-categories.
